channel.title: How to make colored text work
channel.description: Hey, so I have a client and whenever I send a game message like this, for example: "@red@You have unlocked the song: Harmony" it actually displays the @red@ part. How do I make it so that the client recognizes this and makes the text red?

item.title: How to make colored text work
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:543966”]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/374802-money-colors-bored-messing-around.html
^I don’t think he has the legit colors in that, but yeah.[/quote]

Thanks man, you helped a lot. I swear I was searching for a way to make 10m green for at least 20 minutes and i never came across this thread lol

Read full topic
item.source: How to make colored text work

item.title: How to make colored text work
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461

item.source: How to make colored text work

item.title: How to make colored text work
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:543966”][quote author=Limits link=topic=662847.msg4429912#msg4429912 date=1402756568]

Some clients don’t have support for the @color@ system, and instead have a decimal or hexadecimal system in place that was released by galkon awhile ago.
Instead of @col@ it’s <col=decimalColorCode>Your text

It is Galkon’s based and the <col= thing doesn’t work either.
[/quote]
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/307867-new-text-engine-converted-work-galkons.html
Try adding it perhaps?[/quote]

yeah took a while, got it working. By any chance do you know how to make it so that when you have 100k or 10m it shows up in the inventory as white and green, respectively?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make colored text work

Instead of @col@ it’s <col=decimalColorCode>Your text
[/quote]

It is Galkon’s based and the <col= thing doesn’t work either.[/quote]
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/307867-new-text-engine-converted-work-galkons.html
Try adding it perhaps?

Read full topic
